      Classes in com.developmentontheedge.beans.swing.table that implement RowModel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractRowModel
      This abstract class takes care of management of the listeners and provides some convenience methods for generating RowModelEvent and dispatching them to the listeners.
      class  DefaultRowModel
      This is an implementation of RowModel that uses a Vector to store the beans.

      Constructors in com.developmentontheedge.beans.swing.table with parameters of type RowModel 
      Constructor and Description
      BeanTableModelAdapter(RowModel rm, ColumnModel columnModel) 
      RowModelEvent(RowModel source)
      All row data in the table has changed, listeners should discard any state that was based on the rows and requery the RowModel to get the new row count and all the appropriate values.
      RowModelEvent(RowModel source, int row)
      This row of data has been updated.
      RowModelEvent(RowModel source, int firstRow, int lastRow)
      The data in range of [firstRow, lastRow] were updated.
      RowModelEvent(RowModel source, int firstRow, int lastRow, int type)
      The data in range of [firstRow, lastRow] were inserted or updated or deleted.
      SortedBeanTableModelAdapter(RowModel rm, ColumnModel columnModel)
